name: send_voice_message
description: Send a voice message to Discord using ElevenLabs Text-to-Speech. Converts text to speech and sends it as an audio file. IMPORTANT: Audio Tags in square brackets [ ] are NOT spoken - they control HOW the text is spoken! Example: [excited] Hey! will be spoken excitedly WITHOUT saying '[excited]'. Available Audio Tags: EMOTIONS: [excited] (excited), [whispering] (whisper), [laughs] (laugh), [giggles] (giggle), [sighs] (sigh), [sarcastic] (sarcastic), [angry] (angry), [happy] (happy), [sad] (sad), [disgusted] (disgusted), [fearful] (fearful), [surprised] (surprised), [neutral] (neutral), [nervous] (nervous), [calm] (calm), [frustrated] (frustrated), [curious] (curious), [crying] (crying), [mischievously] (mischievous), [shouts] (shout), [clears throat] (clear throat), [breathing] (breathing), [inhales] (inhale), [exhales] (exhale). ACCENTS: [strong French accent], [strong German accent], [strong Spanish accent], [strong Italian accent], [strong British accent], [strong American accent], [strong Russian accent], [strong Japanese accent]. Use this for personal messages, emotional moments, or when you want to show personality. See ELEVENLABS_AUDIO_TAGS_GUIDE.md for complete documentation.

text.description: The text to convert to speech. IMPORTANT: Audio Tags in square brackets [ ] are NOT spoken - they control the emotion! Example: [excited] Hey! will be spoken excitedly WITHOUT saying '[excited]'. Available Audio Tags: EMOTIONS: [excited] (excited/enthusiastic), [whispering] (whisper for secrets), [laughs] (laugh), [giggles] (giggle), [sighs] (sigh), [sarcastic] (sarcastic tone), [angry] (angry tone), [happy] (happy tone), [sad] (sad tone), [disgusted] (disgusted tone), [fearful] (fearful tone), [surprised] (surprised tone), [neutral] (neutral tone), [nervous] (nervous tone), [calm] (calm tone), [frustrated] (frustrated/annoyed tone), [curious] (curious tone), [crying] (crying tone), [mischievously] (mischievous tone), [shouts] (shout), [clears throat] (clear throat), [breathing] (breathing sounds), [inhales] (inhale), [exhales] (exhale). ACCENTS: [strong French accent], [strong German accent], [strong Spanish accent], [strong Italian accent], [strong British accent], [strong American accent], [strong Russian accent], [strong Japanese accent]. Maximum 3000 characters. See ELEVENLABS_AUDIO_TAGS_GUIDE.md for complete documentation.

target.description: Discord User ID (for DM) or Channel ID (for channel message)

target_type.description: Specify 'user' for DM, 'channel' for channel message, or 'auto' for automatic detection (default: auto)

voice_id.description: Optional: ElevenLabs Voice ID (default: configured voice from ELEVENLABS_VOICE_ID environment variable)

model_id.description: Optional: Model ID. Default: 'eleven_multilingual_v2' or configured model. Use 'eleven_turbo_v2_5' for faster generation, 'eleven_multilingual_v2' for multilingual support, or 'eleven_v3' for Audio Tags support. See ElevenLabs Docs for available models.

stability.description: Voice stability (for v3: 0.0=Creative, 0.5=Natural, 1.0=Robust, default: 0.5). Lower = more emotional/variable, Higher = more stable/monotone

similarity_boost.description: Similarity boost (0.0-1.0, default: 0.75). How close to the original voice it should be

style.description: Style exaggeration (0.0-1.0, default: 0.0). Enhances the style of the original speaker. May reduce stability.

use_speaker_boost.description: Enable Speaker Boost for better similarity (default: False). Slightly increases latency.

reply_to_message_id.description: Optional: Discord Message ID to reply to
